# Tender Announcement: Virtual Language Training Services - Atlantic and Western Regions
## Title: Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) Requests Proposals for Virtual Language Training Services

### Notice of Proposed Procurement
The Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) intends to award a contract for virtual language training services in English and/or French for CRA employees in the Atlantic and Western regions.

### Contract Requirements
Proposal documents and supporting information must be submitted in English or French. The successful bidder must provide full-time and part-time virtual language training services, including telephone tutoring and Preparation for Second Language Evaluation (SLE) evaluation level C oral interaction assessment, as required.

### Contract Period
The contract will be awarded for a period of two years, with three one-year extension options.

### Evaluation Criteria
All bids must comply with the requirements of the bid solicitation and meet all mandatory evaluation criteria. The responsive bid with the highest combined rating of technical merit and price will be recommended for award.

### Security Requirements
The security requirements associated with this procurement are detailed in the bid solicitation document.

### Indigenous Business Opportunities
This procurement may be conditionally set aside under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business. To be considered for the set-aside, the bidder must certify that it qualifies as an Indigenous business and will comply with all requirements of the strategy.

### Bid Submission
Bids must be submitted using the Connect service provided by Canada Post Corporation. Questions must be directed in writing to the contracting authority via email: Furqana.Mehkari@cra-arc.gc.ca.
